reviews.title: Amazing stay with such kind people!
reviews.date: Fecha del comentario: 1 de agosto de 2025
reviews.positive_feedback: Maria & Osvaldo immediately welcomed me in with kindness and helped me book a whale watching tour for the following day. The place is very clean with comfortable beds, pillows and hot water in the shower. It‚Äôs in a good location with a view of the wate,  just a ten minute walk from the town. There are also plenty of moto taxis nearby to go wherever you need if you don‚Äôt want to walk. Their place is very secure, always locked but they open up quickly when you return. The breakfast is simple but good, one egg with toast, juice or fruit, coffee or tea. There is also a communal kitchen. Most importantly, when I got really sea sick from the tour to Isla de la plata, I asked Maria for water and toast and she kindly made me hot tea, toast and lovingly sat with me until I began to feel better. Her and her husband are really good, kind people and I highly recommend staying here when in Puerto Lopez. Osvaldo has great sense of humor :) They also offer laundry service if you need. You can also communicate with them directly via WhatsApp which is helpful.

reviews.negative_feedback: The kitchen served its purpose, but a few more utensils (e.g., strainer/colander) would make things easier.
reviews.positive_feedback:
The family ( who live on the property) is friendly, helpful, and well-connected in Puerto Lopez. They arranged reservations for both of my whale watching outings and set things straight when things didn‚Äôt go right for the second outing. They also were very solicitous after my left calf met the teeth of a dog while I was walking to the bus terminal.

But more importantly, I was lucky to get to know the family a bit when they invited me for breakfast. And also lucky because I was there during school holidays and so was able to meet Tamia, Grisell and Geovany‚Äôs lovely and talented daughter. Grisell was very patient with my bumbling Spanish ( she is multilingual).

The bed was comfortable, the shower was hot. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, and provides a small window into a fishing village without the obvious footprint of tourists ( If you want the tourist vibe, there is a low-key hotel down the street at the beach; further along the beach are the wall to wall restaurants and bars).

Oh, and the family dog (Flori) is delightful!

reviews.title: Bien
reviews.date: Fecha del comentario: 11 de mayo de 2023
reviews.positive_feedback:
The room we stayed in had good amenities like air-conditioning, it wasn't too loud and was clean enough. However, I didn't realise it was a homestay..you are renting a room inside of a family's house, which means the communal areas feels claustrophobic and loud unlike other hostels. So considering that, it's quite over priced for what it is. 
However there are some pros- it's secure, filtered water is available, the family is friendly and helpful and there is air-conditioning. But in terms of ambience and space, It's not the most comfortable. Location is also far from the main areas in ayampe. I'd rate it well for practicality but low for a relaxing stay, purely because you're staying in an extended family's house and you can hear loud conversations and phone sounds from your bedroom.
